description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Defects can ruin a software experience and you know how to make sure that this does not happen. You take pleasure in taking a good software and making it perfectly robust. Come join us as we grow our Quality Assurance team!
              

              At Orange Logic, we have challenged ourselves to develop a more flexible, more robust, and more sophisticated software. CORTEX | DAM, our Digital Asset Management tool, provides our customers with the capacity to manage, store, share, and scale their digital libraries. Our company, based in the United States, has locations in Europe and now, in Southeast Asia. We support a diverse customer base that spans across industries such aerospace, fashion, photography, and non-profit. Our newest office in Ho Chi Minh City, will be responsible for all facets of development.
              

              As a QA Engineer in the Quality Engineering Department, you will help us reach our goal of having the best DAM solution in the market because of your attention to detail. Your contributions will be crucial in helping us deliver an adaptable and flawless application to our customers. Your main responsibility will be performing testing and you will consistently monitor and identify bugs by inventing new ways breaking our software.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              What we are looking for:
              

              -   Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
              
              -   At least 5 years experience with 1-2 years experience of Automation testing
              
              -   Good knowledge/experience of both Automation/Manual Testing
              
              -   Hands-on experience with testing applications
              
              -   Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases
              
              -   Organized, detailed oriented person and enjoy finding creative and innovative ways to break software
              
              -   Can communicate in Vietnamese and English
              

              * BENEFITS
              
              Not only are we dedicated to the success of our product, but we are also committed to ensuring the success of our employees, both professionally and personally. When you join Orange Logic, you will receive on-the-job training, as well as opportunities to work on new projects and challenge yourself. You will also reap the benefits of being a full-time employee, which included:
              

              •	Very attractive salary package – we are committed to paying you what you really deserve.
              
              •	Competitive 13-month salary and amazing performance-based bonus
              
              •	Salary review 2 times / year
              
              •	18 days of annual leave per year, plus 4 days for oversea company trip
              
              •	Abundant allowances (lunch, gym, parking, etc.)
              
              •	Premium healthcare insurance
              
              •	Birthday voucher up to 100 USD
              
              •	Happy hours everyday with free snacks, soft drinks, fruit and coffee
              

              Product & team:
              

              •	Great product chosen by global clients: Facebook, Boeing, BBC, AirBnB, ...
              
              •	Daily innovation
              
              •	Be directly involved in the company’s objectives , hopefully you are fond of new technologies and clever algorithms.
              
              •	Flat structure, simple processes, and transparency. Projects are assigned according to your strengths and interests.
              
              •	Work in a sunny modern office with high-quality ergonomic chairs, and multiple screens…
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
